info.title: UNIQREWARDS Client API v3
info.description: The UNIQREWARDS Client API v3 enables our clients to issue digital vouchers. Retrieval of product details, catalogues, and vouchers status and details is also supported by this API.
info.summary: UNIQREWARDS Client API v3 OpenAPI specification

get.description: Retrieve the catalogue of products, listing all configured products available for issuance. Can be used to discover available products and their codes.

request_id.description: The request ID in UUID v4 format, assigned by the API to the request.

products.description: An array of product objects representing each product in the catalogue.

Error.description: Error response structure. Shared by all endpoints.

request_id.description: The request ID in UUID v4 format, assigned by the API to the request.

code.description: A composite code formatted as {http_error_code}-{api_error_code} (e.g., 404-D4E). The HTTP error code indicates the type of error, while the second part specifies the exact issue.

message.description: A brief error message, generally aligned with the HTTP status message.

documentation.description: An extended description providing more context and actions to resolve the issue.

product_code.description: A unique set of alphanumeric characters assigned to the product within the product catalogue, serving as an SKU.

description.description: A brief description of the product.

is_value_based.description: Indicates whether the product is value-based (true) or product-based (false).

is_open_value.description: Allows for open denomination or quantity at issuance (true) or is a fixed denomination / quantity product (false).

is_status_available.description: Indicates whether the status of vouchers issued from this product can be retrieved (true) or not (false).

is_multiple_use.description: Indicates whether the vouchers can be redeemed in multiple transactions or will be fully redeemed in a single transaction.

currency.description: Currency code (ISO 4217 format i.e. SGD) for the product's amount, or an empty string for product-based (is_value_based = false).

amount.description: Face value in cents for value-based products, or number of items for product-based. null for open-value products.

quantity.description: Quantity of this product in stock or null if stock is unlimited.

expiry_scheme.description: Specifies how the voucher's expiration date is determined upon issuance.

valid_from.description: The start date and time of the product validity.

valid_until.description: The end date and time of the product validity, if applicable.

image.description: A URL linking to the product's image.

terms_and_conditions.description: Terms and conditions of the product.

Voucher.title: Voucher
Voucher.description: The voucher object. Contains attributes specific to the voucher and others inherited from the product from which it is issued.

voucher_code.description: The unique voucher code (also referred to as the voucher number) that is accepted by the merchant.

voucher_id.description: The unique technical reference for the voucher, used in Client API requests.

name.description: The name of the voucher as displayed to end-users, generally including its denomination.

status.description: The current status of the voucher.

expiration.description: Expiration date and time of the voucher in ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 format (i.e. 2030-10-12T22:59:59+00:00).

currency.description: Currency code (ISO 4217 format i.e. SGD) for the voucher's amount, or an empty string for product-based (is_value_based = false).

remaining_amount.description: Voucher remaining amount to spend in cents for value-based vouchers, or the number of items for product-based.

product_code.description: The product code identifying the product from which the voucher is issued.

is_value_based.description: Indicates whether the voucher is value-based (true) or product-based (false).

is_status_available.description: Indicates whether the status of the voucher can be retrieved (true) or not (false).

is_multiple_use.description: Indicates whether the vouchers can be redeemed in multiple transactions or will be fully redeemed in a single transaction.

url.description: Full URL providing direct access to the voucher.

short_url.description: Shortened URL to access the voucher, used in combination with a PIN.

short_url_pin.description: PIN code required to access the voucher via the short URL.
